section.name: Sample Projects
section.p: The samples directory in Glean has a set of properties files to configure Glean for a number of sample projects. If you are looking for what a project configuration might look like for different types of source projects, these could give you a start.

Each of the sample configurations assumes a standard download of the project. If you want to try running one of these, the only thing you should have to do is update the configuration to point to the base directory where you unpacked the project.
